identity.description: The identity for which the Amazon SNS topic will be set. You can specify an identity by using its name or by using its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

notification_type.description: The type of notifications that will be published to the specified Amazon SNS topic. Valid Values: Bounce, Complaint or Delivery.

topic_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic. Can be set to "" (an empty string) to disable publishing.
